alert.note: Alert for Gregg; Rusk; Smith (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 4:58PM CDT until June 13 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Smith County in northeastern Texas... Northwestern Rusk County in northeastern Texas... Gregg County in northeastern Texas... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 458 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Tyler, moving east at 45 mph. Another developing severe thunderstorm was indicated 10 miles west of Tyler, also moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Quarter to ping pong ball size hail has fallen with these storms. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Tyler, Longview, Kilgore, Whitehouse, White Oak, Overton, New London, Arp, Clarksville City, Liberty City, Lake Palestine, Lakeport, Noonday, New Chapel Hill, Winona, Rolling Meadows, Monroe, Laird Hill and Oak Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: These storms are producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
